original_title: Crepe Runner QSR opens four new outlets in April 2023
original_body_lines: Crepe Runner marked a milestone in April by opening four new outlets. In a strategic move that demonstrates their expertise in quick service restaurants (QSR), Crepe Runner strategically positioned their new havens of indulgence in prime locations, ensuring a convenient and enjoyable QSR experience for their esteemed crepe lovers. These new destinations can be found at the Colombo City Centre, the picturesque Peradeniya Rd Kandy, the vibrant Nawala, and the ever-popular Cool Planet Nugegoda.

Prepare to be astounded as Crepe Runner aims to launch multiple additional outlets before the end of 2023. Their ambitious goal is to spread the irresistible taste of resilience to every nook and cranny of Sri Lanka and even venture into international territories.

Picture this: you step into one of Crepe Runner’s new outlets, the aroma of freshly prepared crepes wafting through the air. Every crepe is meticulously crafted with the freshest ingredients, ensuring a symphony of flavours on your palate. It’s not just about the culinary delight. It’s an experience a truly satisfying and memorable one. The Founder and CEO Abdus Salaam cordially invites loyal customers and curious newcomers alike to embark on this enchanting journey of taste and pleasure.
